revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Ruins of Conflict |image = [[File:Ruins of Conflict.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ruins of Conflict. |tokens = 1,200,000 |location = Melemele Woods Megadungeon. }}
<!--T:2--> '''Ruins of Conflict''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 16,435,490 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! <!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !!
